data.title: Jazz at LACMA: 6 Beats Apart
data.meta_description:
Celebrate L.A.’s finest jazz musicians with Jazz at LACMA, presented Friday evenings from May through October.

This week, join us for a concert with 6 Beats Apart.

Led by bassist Bruce Lett, the six-piece band was born out of the COVID pandemic by musicians that just had to keep playing their instruments. The group has since made a name for themselves performing classic jazz fusion music of the 70's, 80's, and 90's at leading clubs and venues across Southern California.
data.text:
Celebrate L.A.’s finest jazz musicians with Jazz at LACMA, presented Friday evenings from May through October.

This week, join us for a concert with 6 Beats Apart.

Led by bassist Bruce Lett, the six-piece band was born out of the COVID pandemic by musicians that just had to keep playing their instruments. The group has since made a name for themselves performing classic jazz fusion music of the 70's, 80's, and 90's at leading clubs and venues across Southern California.

Jazz at LACMA is free and open to all. Seating is limited and first come, first served. Visitors are encouraged to wear face masks in all indoor spaces including restrooms.
